location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No.3 from Lewis Pelly, Herat to Charles Alison, British Minister at Tehran

mods.abstract: Letter reporting on a recent victory over the Jumsheedee [Jamshidi] tribe in which the Herat army was led by the eldest son of Sultan Ahmed Khan, and reporting that the late Chief of that tribe Abdullah Khan had been one of the key instigators of a plot to depose Sultan Ahmed Khan.
